text.value:
if OBJECT_ID('Integration.Lineage', 'U') is NULL
    begin
    create schema Integration;
    create table Integration.Lineage (
        LineageKey int Identity(1,1),
        TableName sysname COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS NOT NULL,
        SchemaName sysname COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS NOT NULL,
        [WasSuccessful] bit NOT NULL,
        CutoffDate datetime2 not null,
        WatermarkTime datetime2 not null,
        CONSTRAINT PK_IL primary key (LineageKey)
    );
    end
